query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 «Vergine Madre, figlia del tuo figlio, 2 umile e alta più che creatura, 3 termine fisso d’etterno consiglio,
4 tu se’ colei che l’umana natura 5 nobilitasti sì, che ’l suo fattore 6 non disdegnò di farsi sua fattura.
query.result:
**English:**
1 "Virgin Mother, daughter of your Son, 2 humble and exalted more than any other creature, 3 fixed term of eternal counsel,
4 you are the one who ennobles human nature 5 so much that its Maker 6 did not disdain to become its creature.
**Malay:**
1 "Perawan Suci, putri dari putramu, 2 rendah hati dan mulia lebih dari makhluk lainnya, 3 akhir yang pasti dari rencana kekal,
4 engkaulah yang memuliakan kodrat manusia 5 sedemikian rupa sehingga Penciptanya 6 tidak meremehkan untuk menjadi ciptaan-Nya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Nel ventre tuo si raccese l’amore, 8 per lo cui caldo ne l’etterna pace 9 così è germinato questo fiore.
query.result:
**English:**
7 In your womb love was rekindled, 8 through whose warmth in eternal peace 9 this flower has thus germinated.
**Malay:**
7 Di dalam rahimmu cinta dinyalakan kembali, 8 melalui kehangatannya dalam kedamaian abadi 9 bunga ini telah tumbuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Qui se’ a noi meridïana face 11 di caritate, e giuso, intra ’ mortali, 12 se’ di speranza fontana vivace.
query.result:
**English:**
10 Here you are to us the noonday face 11 of charity, and down below, among mortals, 12 you are the living fountain of hope.
**Malay:**
10 Di sini Anda adalah wajah siang hari bagi kami 11 kasih sayang, dan di bawah, di antara manusia, 12 Anda adalah sumber harapan yang hidup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Donna, se’ tanto grande e tanto vali, 14 che qual vuol grazia e a te non ricorre, 15 sua disïanza vuol volar sanz’ ali.
query.result:
**English:**
13 Lady, if you are so great and so worthy, 14 that whoever wants grace and does not resort to you, 15 his desire wants to fly without wings.
**Malay:**
13 Wanita, jika Anda begitu agung dan begitu berharga, 14 sehingga siapa pun yang menginginkan rahmat dan tidak meminta kepada Anda, 15 keinginannya ingin terbang tanpa sayap.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 La tua benignità non pur soccorre 17 a chi domanda, ma molte fïate 18 liberamente al dimandar precorre.
query.result:
**English:**
16 Your kindness not only helps 17 those who ask, but many times 18 freely anticipates the request.
**Malay:**
16 Kebaikanmu tidak hanya menolong 17 mereka yang meminta, tetapi berkali-kali 18 dengan sukarela mendahului permintaan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 In te misericordia, in te pietate, 20 in te magnificenza, in te s’aduna 21 quantunque in creatura è di bontate.
query.result:
**English:**
19 In you is mercy, in you is pity, 20 in you is magnificence, in you is gathered 21 whatever goodness there is in creation.
**Malay:**
19 Dalam dirimu ada belas kasihan, dalam dirimu ada rasa iba, 20 dalam dirimu ada keagungan, dalam dirimu terkumpul 21 semua kebaikan yang ada dalam ciptaan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Or questi, che da l’infima lacuna 23 de l’universo infin qui ha vedute 24 le vite spiritali ad una ad una,
25 supplica a te, per grazia, di virtute 26 tanto, che possa con li occhi levarsi 27 più alto verso l’ultima salute.
query.result:
**English:**
22 Now this one, who from the lowest abyss 23 of the universe has seen up to here 24 the spiritual lives one by one,
25 begs you, by grace, for so much virtue 26 that he may be able to raise his eyes 27 higher toward the ultimate salvation.
**Malay:**
22 Sekarang yang ini, yang dari jurang terendah 23 alam semesta telah melihat sampai di sini 24 kehidupan spiritual satu per satu,
25 memohon kepadamu, demi kasih karunia, untuk begitu banyak kebajikan 26 sehingga ia dapat mengangkat matanya 27 lebih tinggi menuju keselamatan terakhir.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 E io, che mai per mio veder non arsi 29 più ch’i’ fo per lo suo, tutti miei prieghi 30 ti porgo, e priego che non sieno scarsi,
31 perché tu ogne nube li disleghi 32 di sua mortalità co’ prieghi tuoi, 33 sì che ’l sommo piacer li si dispieghi.
query.result:
**English:**
28 And I, who never burned for my own sake 29 more than I do for hers, offer you all my prayers, 30 and I beg that they not be scarce,
31 so that you may dispel every cloud 32 of her mortality with your prayers, 33 so that the highest pleasure may be revealed to her.
**Malay:**
28 Dan aku, yang tidak pernah terbakar demi diriku sendiri 29 lebih dari yang kulakukan untuknya, mempersembahkan kepadamu semua doaku, 30 dan aku mohon agar doa-doaku itu tidak sedikit,
31 agar engkau dapat menghilangkan setiap awan 32 kematiannya dengan doa-doamu, 33 sehingga kesenangan tertinggi dapat terungkap padanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Ancor ti priego, regina, che puoi 35 ciò che tu vuoli, che conservi sani, 36 dopo tanto veder, li affetti suoi.
query.result:
**English:**
34 Still I pray thee, O queen, who canst 35 do whatsoever thou wilt, that thou preserve 36 his affections sound after so much seeing.
**Malay:**
34 Masih aku mohon padamu, ratu, yang dapat 35 melakukan apa pun yang kau kehendaki, agar kau lestarikan 36 kasih sayangnya yang murni setelah melihat begitu banyak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Vinca tua guardia i movimenti umani: 38 vedi Beatrice con quanti beati 39 per li miei prieghi ti chiudon le mani!».
query.result:
**English:**
37 May your ancient guard inspire human actions: 38 see Beatrice with how many blessed ones 39 at my prayers they clasp their hands for you!”.
**Malay:**
37 Semoga pengawal kuno Anda menginspirasi tindakan manusia: 38 lihat Beatrice dengan betapa banyak orang yang diberkati 39 atas permohonanku mereka menggenggam tangan mereka untukmu!”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 E io ch’al fine di tutt’ i disii 47 appropinquava, sì com’ io dovea, 48 l’ardor del desiderio in me finii.
query.result:
**English:**
46 And I, who was approaching the end of all desires, 47 as I was destined to, 48 the ardor of desire ended in me.
**Malay:**
46 Dan aku, yang sedang mendekati akhir dari semua keinginan, 47 sebagaimana yang telah ditakdirkan kepadaku, 48 bara keinginan dalam diriku padam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Bernardo m’accennava, e sorridea, 50 perch’ io guardassi suso; ma io era 51 già per me stesso tal qual ei volea:
52 ché la mia vista, venendo sincera, 53 e più e più intrava per lo raggio 54 de l’alta luce che da sé è vera.
query.result:
**English:**
49 Bernard pointed to me and smiled, 50 so that I would look up; but I was already 51 by myself such as he wanted me to be:
52 for my sight, becoming pure, 53 entered more and more into the ray 54 of the high light that is true in itself.
**Malay:**
49 Bernardo menunjuk kepadaku, dan tersenyum, 50 agar aku melihat ke atas; tetapi aku sudah 51 dengan sendirinya seperti yang ia inginkan:
52 karena penglihatanku, menjadi murni, 53 masuk semakin dalam ke dalam cahaya 54 cahaya tinggi yang benar dengan sendirinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Da quinci innanzi il mio veder fu maggio 56 che ’l parlar mostra, ch’a tal vista cede, 57 e cede la memoria a tanto oltraggio.
query.result:
**English:**
55 From here on, my sight was greater 56 than speech can show, which fails before such a vision, 57 and memory fails before such an outrage.
**Malay:**
55 Dari sini dan seterusnya, penglihatanku lebih hebat 56 daripada yang dapat ditunjukkan oleh perkataan, yang menyerah di hadapan penglihatan seperti itu, 57 dan ingatan menyerah di hadapan penghinaan yang begitu besar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Qual è colüi che sognando vede, 59 che dopo ’l sogno la passione impressa 60 rimane, e l’altro a la mente non riede,
61 cotal son io, ché quasi tutta cessa 62 mia visïone, e ancor mi distilla 63 nel core il dolce che nacque da essa.
query.result:
**English:**
58 Such is he who sees in a dream, 59 that after the dream the passion imprinted 60 remains, but the rest does not return to the mind,
61 such am I, for almost all of my vision ceases, 62 and still the sweetness born from it 63 distills in my heart.
**Malay:**
58 Begitulah orang yang melihat dalam mimpi, 59 bahwa setelah mimpi itu kesan yang mendalam 60 tetap ada, tetapi yang lainnya tidak kembali ke pikiran,
61 begitulah aku, karena hampir semua penglihatanku lenyap, 62 dan masih rasa manis yang lahir darinya 63 menetes di hatiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Così la neve al sol si disigilla; 65 così al vento ne le foglie levi 66 si perdea la sentenza di Sibilla.
query.result:
**English:**
64 Thus the snow melts in the sun; 65 thus in the wind among the light leaves 66 the Sibyl's prophecy was lost.
**Malay:**
64 Begitulah salju mencair di bawah sinar matahari; 65 begitulah dalam angin di antara dedaunan yang ringan 66 ramalan Sibyl menghilang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 O somma luce che tanto ti levi 68 da’ concetti mortali, a la mia mente 69 ripresta un poco di quel che parevi,
70 e fa la lingua mia tanto possente, 71 ch’una favilla sol de la tua gloria 72 possa lasciare a la futura gente;
73 ché, per tornare alquanto a mia memoria 74 e per sonare un poco in questi versi, 75 più si conceperà di tua vittoria.
query.result:
**English:**
67 O supreme light that rises so high 68 above mortal concepts, restore to my mind 69 a little of what you seemed to be,
70 and make my tongue so powerful 71 that a single spark of your glory 72 may be left for future generations;
73 for, in returning somewhat to my memory 74 and in sounding a little in these verses, 75 more will be conceived of your victory.
**Malay:**
67 Wahai cahaya agung yang begitu tinggi 68 dari konsep-konsep fana, kembalikan ke pikiranku 69 sedikit dari apa yang tampak padamu,
70 dan buatlah lidahku begitu kuat, 71 sehingga percikan tunggal dari kemuliaan-Mu 72 dapat kutinggalkan untuk generasi mendatang;
73 karena, dengan kembali sedikit ke ingatanku 74 dan dengan membunyikan sedikit dalam syair-syair ini, 75 lebih banyak yang akan dipahami tentang kemenangan-Mu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Io credo, per l’acume ch’io soffersi 77 del vivo raggio, ch’i’ sarei smarrito, 78 se li occhi miei da lui fossero aversi.
query.result:
**English:**
76 I believe, because of the sharpness of the pain I suffered 77 from the living ray, that I would have been lost, 78 if my eyes had been turned away from it.
**Malay:**
76 Aku percaya, karena ketajaman rasa sakit yang kuderita 77 dari sinar yang hidup, bahwa aku akan tersesat, 78 jika mataku berpaling darinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 E’ mi ricorda ch’io fui più ardito 80 per questo a sostener, tanto ch’i’ giunsi 81 l’aspetto mio col valore infinito.
query.result:
**English:**
79 And it reminds me that I was more bold 80 to sustain this, so that I reached 81 my appearance with infinite value.
**Malay:**
79 Dan mengingatkanku bahwa aku lebih berani 80 untuk mempertahankan ini, sehingga aku mencapai 81 penampilanku dengan nilai yang tak terbatas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Oh abbondante grazia ond’ io presunsi 83 ficcar lo viso per la luce etterna, 84 tanto che la veduta vi consunsi!
85 Nel suo profondo vidi che s’interna, 86 legato con amore in un volume, 87 ciò che per l’universo si squaderna:
88 sustanze e accidenti e lor costume 89 quasi conflati insieme, per tal modo 90 che ciò ch’i’ dico è un semplice lume.
query.result:
**English:**
82 Oh abundant grace, through which I presumed 83 to fix my gaze on the eternal light, 84 so that my sight was consumed by it!
85 In its depths I saw that it contains, 86 bound together with love in a single volume, 87 all that is dispersed throughout the universe:
88 substances and accidents and their properties, 89 almost fused together, in such a way 90 that what I say is a mere glimmer.
**Malay:**
82 Wahai rahmat yang melimpah, yang dengannya aku berani 83 menatap cahaya abadi, 84 sehingga penglihatanku pun sirna karenanya!
85 Di kedalamannya, kulihat bahwa ia mengandung, 86 terikat bersama dengan cinta dalam satu jilid, 87 semua yang tersebar di seluruh alam semesta:
88 zat dan aksiden serta sifat-sifatnya, 89 hampir menyatu, sedemikian rupa 90 sehingga apa yang kukatakan hanyalah cahaya redup.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 La forma universal di questo nodo 92 credo ch’i’ vidi, perché più di largo, 93 dicendo questo, mi sento ch’i’ godo.
query.result:
**English:**
91 The universal form of this knot 92 I believe I saw, because more broadly, 93 saying this, I feel that I rejoice.
**Malay:**
91 Bentuk universal dari simpul ini 92 kupikir kulihat, karena lebih luas, 93 mengatakan ini, kurasakan bahwa aku bersukacita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Un punto solo m’è maggior letargo 95 che venticinque secoli a la ’mpresa 96 che fé Nettuno ammirar l’ombra d’Argo.
query.result:
**English:**
94 A single moment of sleep is more lethargy to me 95 than twenty-five centuries of the enterprise 96 that made Neptune admire the shadow of Argo.
**Malay:**
94 Satu titik saja bagiku lebih merupakan kelesuan 95 daripada dua puluh lima abad usaha 96 yang membuat Neptunus mengagumi bayangan Argo.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Così la mente mia, tutta sospesa, 98 mirava fissa, immobile e attenta, 99 e sempre di mirar faceasi accesa.
query.result:
**English:**
97 Thus my mind, all in suspense, 98 gazed fixedly, motionless and intent, 99 and ever grew more kindled with desire to see.
**Malay:**
97 Demikianlah pikiranku, semuanya dalam keadaan terhenti, 98 memandang dengan saksama, tidak bergerak dan penuh perhatian, 99 dan semakin bersemangat untuk melihat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Omai sarà più corta mia favella, 107 pur a quel ch’io ricordo, che d’un fante 108 che bagni ancor la lingua a la mammella.
query.result:
**English:**
106 Oh, my speech will be shorter, 107 even to that which I remember, than that of a child 108 who still wets his tongue at the breast.
**Malay:**
106 Oh, ucapanku akan lebih pendek, 107 bahkan untuk apa yang kuingat, daripada ucapan seorang anak 108 yang masih membasahi lidahnya di payudara.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Oh quanto è corto il dire e come fioco 122 al mio concetto! e questo, a quel ch’i’ vidi, 123 è tanto, che non basta a dicer ‘poco’.
query.result:
**English:**
121 Oh, how short the telling is and how weak 122 to my conception! And this, to what I saw, 123 is so much that it is not enough to say ‘little’.
**Malay:**
121 Oh, betapa pendeknya ucapan itu dan betapa lemahnya 122 terhadap konsepku! Dan ini, terhadap apa yang kulihat, 123 begitu banyak sehingga tidak cukup untuk mengatakan ‘sedikit’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 O luce etterna che sola in te sidi, 125 sola t’intendi, e da te intelletta 126 e intendente te ami e arridi!
127 Quella circulazion che sì concetta 128 pareva in te come lume reflesso, 129 da li occhi miei alquanto circunspetta,
130 dentro da sé, del suo colore stesso, 131 mi parve pinta de la nostra effige: 132 per che ’l mio viso in lei tutto era messo.
query.result:
**English:**
124 O eternal light that alone in yourself abide, 125 alone understand yourself, and by yourself understood 126 and understanding love and smile upon yourself!
127 That circulation which appeared so conceived 128 in you as reflected light, 129 somewhat cautiously observed by my eyes,
130 within itself, of its own color, 131 seemed to me painted with our image: 132 because my face was wholly placed in it.
**Malay:**
124 Wahai cahaya abadi yang hanya ada dalam diri-Mu, 125 hanya memahami diri-Mu sendiri, dan oleh diri-Mu sendiri dipahami 126 dan memahami cinta dan tersenyum pada diri-Mu sendiri!
127 Peredaran yang tampak begitu dipahami 128 dalam diri-Mu sebagai cahaya yang dipantulkan, 129 agak hati-hati diamati oleh mataku,
130 di dalam dirinya sendiri, dengan warnanya sendiri, 131 tampak bagiku dilukis dengan citra kita: 132 karena wajahku sepenuhnya ditempatkan di dalamnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Qual è ’l geomètra che tutto s’affige 134 per misurar lo cerchio, e non ritrova, 135 pensando, quel principio ond’ elli indige,
136 tal era io a quella vista nova: 137 veder voleva come si convenne 138 l’imago al cerchio e come vi s’indova;
139 ma non eran da ciò le proprie penne: 140 se non che la mia mente fu percossa 141 da un fulgore in che sua voglia venne.
query.result:
**English:**
133 Like the geometer who sets himself to measure the circle 134 and cannot find the principle he needs, 135 thinking hard,
136 such was I at that new sight: 137 I wanted to see how the image fitted the circle 138 and how it was placed there;
139 but my own wings were not enough for that: 140 until my mind was struck 141 by a flash of light that gave it the answer.
**Malay:**
133 Seperti ahli ukur yang berusaha 134 untuk mengukur lingkaran, dan tidak menemukan, 135 dengan berpikir keras, prinsip yang ia perlukan,
136 begitulah aku pada pemandangan baru itu: 137 aku ingin melihat bagaimana bayangan itu cocok dengan lingkaran 138 dan bagaimana ia ditempatkan di sana;
139 tetapi sayapku sendiri tidak cukup untuk itu: 140 sampai pikiranku disambar 141 oleh kilatan cahaya yang memberinya jawaban.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 A l’alta fantasia qui mancò possa; 143 ma già volgeva il mio disio e ’l velle, 144 sì come rota ch’igualmente è mossa,
145 l’amor che move il sole e l’altre stelle.
query.result:
**English:**
142 At that lofty fantasy, my power failed; 143 but already my desire and my will were turning, 144 like a wheel that is moved evenly,
145 by the love that moves the sun and the other stars.
**Malay:**
142 Pada khayalan yang tinggi itu, kekuatanku gagal; 143 tetapi sudah berputar keinginanku dan kemahuanku, 144 seperti roda yang bergerak dengan seimbang,
145 cinta yang menggerakkan matahari dan bintang-bintang lainnya.
